Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Combine lemon juice, garlic, capers, Dijon mustard, nutritional yeast, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
Slowly whisk in olive oil until dressing emulsifies.
Add tofu cubes and croutons to the salad.
Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese and serve immediately.
